title: Force on proton in magnetic field

content.prompt: A proton moving to the right in the plane of the page with speed v enters a magnetic field of magnitude B directed toward the top of the page. What is the direction of the initial magnetic force that is exerted on the proton?

choices.label: Toward the top of the page
No direction, because there is no magnetic force on the proton

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
